message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product, which I believe will significantly enhance the value and functionality of your operations. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, the product is valued at $12,000 by you. Considering this, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire it at an exclusive price of $11,000. This offer is designed to provide you with substantial savings while ensuring you receive a product that exceeds your expectations. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.
